name: Stackable Gems
description: Adds another variation of gems that can stack together. Transmute a gem in the Cube to convert it between the two variants. Easy upgrade stack of gems. Based on https://www.nexusmods.com/diablo2resurrected/mods/80.
author: olegbl

config.name: Convert When Destacking
config.description: Enable to have the split off gem automatically convert to a non-stackable variant when splitting a stack. Warning: this adds 15k+ (max stack => 500) cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.

config.name: Recipe to upgrade stack of gems
config.description: Add recipes to upgrade stack of gems. Stack of gems + gem => gem one tier higher. Use with "Convert When Destacking" => checked. Warning: this adds 700+ (every 10 max stack) cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.
